summary: Diff implements backend get-or-create user badge/ID API with per-caller authorization, adds frontend hook and UI to fetch/display it after authentication, adds external website link and landing copy, and adds an /events page and navigation route. Also includes additional theming/style changes and extra content not explicitly requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Global visual/theme changes (warm amber/peach palette, Tailwind theme adjustments) not requested by REQ-11â€“REQ-14.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest focuses on user ID+badge issuance/display and adding external link + Events page; it does not request a new color palette/theme update in this change set.

hallucinated_features.description: Footer attribution content (mentions 'caffeine.ai' and DMC Technologies attribution) added/changed beyond the specified external link requirement.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-13 requires a clearly labeled external link to dmc-technologies.fr; it does not mention adding third-party/attribution footer content.

hallucinated_features.description: Expanded 'What's Next?' feature marketing sections on the Events/Coming Soon page (enhanced community features, learning resources, real-world applications).
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-14 asks for clear English copy that step 1 is creating an ID and next step is coming soon, plus a link to the external site; additional feature roadmapping content was not requested.
